overview: In the aristocratic Oddy-Pittman home, nothing is quite normal. Lanny, for one, is the daughter of the family's chauffeur, who's been in love with Tony Oddy-Pittman for as long as she can remember. And since she's totally beautiful and completely hot, Tony is very much back in love with her...and never forgets it for a minute. But on the way to a finest finishing school in France, Lanny discovers something about Tony that not even Paris can make her forget.
tagline: Can Paris Make Her Forget The Past?
title: The Chauffeur's Daughter
